main event: A civilian reported sighting a flying saucer in Cheektowaga, New York on June 10, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as V-shaped and white in color with a blinking effect., It left no vapor trail., The sighting involved one object observed from the ground., The observation was reportedly 'hot,' indicating urgency or immediacy., The author expressed interest in receiving more information about flying saucers from the Department of Defense.
witness description: a civilian who had read about flying saucers
